TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdvancedFilters extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class provides writable access to certain attributes so that users can modify read-only properties of the "dummy" principal object that is passed to a object when using [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e).

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters> class is accessed from a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> object through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> property, and is effectually treated like a property of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> object, and isn't intended to be used on its own.
## Examples See the [Query By Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) topic for example code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal p) cil managed

Docs.summary: Instantiates a new object. Not intended to be called directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Applications should access <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AdvancedFilters> through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal.AdvancedSearchFilter%2A> property of the user object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AccountExpirationDate(valuetype System.DateTime expirationTime, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType match) cil managed

Docs.param: A that specifies how expirationTime should be used in the comparison.
Docs.summary: Sets the query filter for the attribute to the specified time and comparison type.

Docs.summary: Creates a query filter for a property in an extended class.
